brief.en: 1 Fixed a Socket hang up error when sending a transaction, but the transaction was sent successfully./n2 Optimize the transaction list to support the display of multiple transfers in a transaction/n3 Optimize the footer. After logging in, click the node name of the footer to jump to the page to switch to the verification node.
brief.zh: 1 修复发送交易时候报Socket hang up的错误，但交易却发送成功了/n2 优化交易列表，支持展示一笔交易中有多个转账/n3 优化页脚，登录后点击页脚的节点名称可以跳转到切换到验证节点页面
